verses.verse: And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Take <S%H5375><s%> the <S%H7218>sum<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%>, by their <S%H4940>families<s%>, by their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses<s%>,

from <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> even until <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%>, all that <S%H935>enter<s%> upon the <S%H6635>service<s%>, to <S%H6213>do<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>.
This is the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, about the <S%H6944>most<s%> holy <S%H6944>things<s%>:

when the <S%H4264>camp<s%> setteth <S%H5265>forward<s%>, <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall go <S%H935>in<s%>, and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and they shall take <S%H3381>down<s%> the <S%H6532>veil<s%> of the <S%H4539>screen<s%>, and <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the testimony with <S%H5715>it<s%>,

and shall <S%H5414>put<s%> thereon a <S%H3681>covering<s%> <S%H8476>of<s%> <S%H5785>sealskin<s%>, and shall <S%H6566>spread<s%> <S%H4605>over<s%> it a <S%H899>cloth<s%> <S%H3632>all<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and shall <S%H7760>put<s%> in the staves <S%H905>thereof<s%>.

And upon the <S%H7979>table<s%> of <S%H6440>showbread<s%> they shall <S%H6566>spread<s%> a <S%H899>cloth<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> thereon the <S%H7086>dishes<s%>, and the <S%H3709>spoons<s%>, and the <S%H4518>bowls<s%> and the <S%H7184>cups<s%> <S%H5262>wherewith<s%> to pour <S%H8548>out<s%>; and the continual bread shall be <S%H3899>thereon<s%>:

and they shall <S%H6566>spread<s%> upon them a <S%H899>cloth<s%> of <S%H8438>scarlet<s%>, and <S%H3680>cover<s%> the same with a <S%H4372>covering<s%> <S%H8476>of<s%> <S%H5785>sealskin<s%>, and shall <S%H7760>put<s%> in the staves <S%H905>thereof<s%>.

And they shall <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H899>cloth<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> of the <S%H3974>light<s%>, and its <S%H5216>lamps<s%>, and its <S%H4457>snuffers<s%>, and its <S%H4289>snuffdishes<s%>, and all the <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> <S%H8334>thereof<s%>, wherewith they minister unto it:

and they shall <S%H5414>put<s%> it and all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> thereof within a <S%H4372>covering<s%> <S%H8476>of<s%> <S%H5785>sealskin<s%>, and shall <S%H5414>put<s%> it upon the <S%H4132>frame<s%>.

And upon the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> they shall <S%H6566>spread<s%> a <S%H899>cloth<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and <S%H3680>cover<s%> it with a <S%H4372>covering<s%> <S%H8476>of<s%> <S%H5785>sealskin<s%>, and shall <S%H7760>put<s%> in the staves <S%H905>thereof<s%>:

and they shall <S%H3947>take<s%> all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H8335>ministry<s%>, wherewith they <S%H8334>minister<s%> in the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> them in a <S%H899>cloth<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and <S%H3680>cover<s%> them with a <S%H4372>covering<s%> <S%H8476>of<s%> <S%H5785>sealskin<s%>, and shall <S%H5414>put<s%> them on the <S%H4132>frame<s%>.
And they shall take away the <S%H1878>ashes<s%> from the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and <S%H6566>spread<s%> a <S%H713>purple<s%> cloth <S%H899>thereon<s%>:

and they shall <S%H5414>put<s%> upon it all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> <S%H8334>thereof<s%>, wherewith they minister about <S%H4289>it<s%>, the firepans, the <S%H4207>flesh-hooks<s%>, and the <S%H3257>shovels<s%>, and the <S%H4219>basins<s%>, all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%>; and they shall <S%H6566>spread<s%> upon it a <S%H3681>covering<s%> <S%H8476>of<s%> <S%H5785>sealskin<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> in the staves <S%H905>thereof<s%>.

And when <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> have made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H3680>covering<s%> the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>, and all the <S%H3627>furniture<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>, as the <S%H4264>camp<s%> is set <S%H5265>forward<s%>; <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H1121>that<s%>, the sons of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H5060>it<s%>: but they shall not touch the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>, lest they <S%H4191>die<s%>. These things are the <S%H4853>burden<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>.

And the <S%H6486>charge<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall be the <S%H8081>oil<s%> for the <S%H3974>light<s%>, and the <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%>, and the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%>, and the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%>, the <S%H6486>charge<s%> of all the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, and of all that therein <S%H6944>is<s%>, the sanctuary, and the furniture <S%H3627>thereof<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
Cut ye not <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>;

but thus <S%H6213>do<s%> unto <S%H2421>them<s%>, that they may live, and not <S%H4191>die<s%>, when they <S%H5066>approach<s%> unto the <S%H6944>most<s%> holy <S%H6944>things<s%>: <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall go <S%H935>in<s%>, and <S%H7760>appoint<s%> them <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to his <S%H5656>service<s%> and to his <S%H4853>burden<s%>;
but they shall not go <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> even for a <S%H1104>moment<s%>, lest they <S%H4191>die<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
Take <S%H5375><s%> the <S%H7218>sum<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershon<s%> <S%H1>also<s%>, by their fathers' <S%H1004>houses<s%>, by their <S%H4940>families<s%>;

from <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> until <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> shalt thou <S%H6485>number<s%> <S%H935>them<s%>; all that enter in to <S%H6633>wait<s%> upon the <S%H6635>service<s%>, to <S%H5647>do<s%> the <S%H5656>work<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>.
This is the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1649>Gershonites<s%>, in <S%H5647>serving<s%> and in bearing <S%H4853>burdens<s%>:

they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, and the <S%H4908>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, its <S%H4372>covering<s%>, and the <S%H4372>covering<s%> of <S%H8476>sealskin<s%> that is <S%H4605>above<s%> upon <S%H4539>it<s%>, and the screen for the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>,

and the <S%H7050>hangings<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%>, and the <S%H4539>screen<s%> for the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%>, which is by the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> and by the <S%H4196>altar<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, and their <S%H4340>cords<s%>, and all the <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of their <S%H5656>service<s%>, and whatsoever shall be <S%H6213>done<s%> with <S%H5647>them<s%>: therein shall they serve.

At the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall be all the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H1649>Gershonites<s%>, in all their <S%H4853>burden<s%>, and in all their <S%H5656>service<s%>; and ye shall <S%H6485>appoint<s%> unto them in <S%H4931>charge<s%> all their <S%H4853>burden<s%>.

This is the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H1649>Gershonites<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>: and their <S%H4931>charge<s%> shall be under the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H385>Ithamar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>.
As for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%>, thou shalt <S%H6485>number<s%> them by their <S%H4940>families<s%>, by their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses<s%>;

from <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> even unto <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> shalt thou <S%H6485>number<s%> <S%H935>them<s%>, every one that entereth upon the <S%H6635>service<s%>, to <S%H5647>do<s%> the <S%H5656>work<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>.

And this is the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of their <S%H4853>burden<s%>, according to all their <S%H5656>service<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>: the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, and the <S%H1280>bars<s%> <S%H5982>thereof<s%>, and the pillars <S%H134>thereof<s%>, and the sockets thereof,

and the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, and their <S%H134>sockets<s%>, and their <S%H3489>pins<s%>, and their <S%H4340>cords<s%>, with all their <S%H3627>instruments<s%>, and with all their <S%H5656>service<s%>: and by <S%H8034>name<s%> ye shall <S%H6485>appoint<s%> the <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of their <S%H4853>burden<s%>.

This is the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%>, according to all their <S%H5656>service<s%>, in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, under the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H385>Ithamar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H6485>numbered<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites<s%> by their <S%H4940>families<s%>, and by their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses<s%>,

from <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> even unto <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%>, every one that <S%H935>entered<s%> upon the <S%H6635>service<s%>, for <S%H5656>work<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>:
and those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them by their <S%H4940>families<s%> were two <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%>.

These are they that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites<s%>, all that did <S%H5647>serve<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, whom <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6485>numbered<s%> according to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.
And those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershon<s%>, their <S%H4940>families<s%>, and by their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses<s%>,

from <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> even unto <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%>, every one that <S%H935>entered<s%> upon the <S%H6635>service<s%>, for <S%H5656>work<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>,

even those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H4940>them<s%>, by their families, by their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses<s%>, were two <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%>.

These are they that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershon<s%>, all that did <S%H5647>serve<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, whom <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6485>numbered<s%> according to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%>, by their <S%H4940>families<s%>, by their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses<s%>,

from <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> even unto <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%>, every one that <S%H935>entered<s%> upon the <S%H6635>service<s%>, for <S%H5656>work<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>,
even those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them by their <S%H4940>families<s%>, were <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and two <S%H3967>hundred<s%>.

These are they that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%>, whom <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6485>numbered<s%> according to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

All those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, whom <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6485>numbered<s%>, by their <S%H4940>families<s%>, and by their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses<s%>,

from <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> even unto <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%>, every one that <S%H935>entered<s%> in to <S%H5647>do<s%> the <S%H5656>work<s%> of <S%H5656>service<s%>, and the work of bearing <S%H4853>burdens<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>,
even those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H8083>them<s%>, were eight <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8084>fourscore<s%>.

According to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> they were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> according to his <S%H5656>service<s%>, and according to his <S%H4853>burden<s%>: thus were they <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H3068>him<s%>, as Jehovah <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.
